items.content_html: A simple and lightweight Notes App built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This web-based application allows users to create, view, and delete notes directly in the browser. All data is stored locally using LocalStorage, so your notes stay safe even after refreshing or closing the tab.
items.title: shruticl-03/Notes-App: A simple and lightweight Notes App built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This web-based application allows users to create, view, and delete notes directly in the browser. All data is stored locally using LocalStorage, so your notes stay safe even after refreshing or closing the tab.
